ThingDef.label: Wheat
ThingDef.description: Unprocessed wheat grains.

ThingDef.label: Rye
ThingDef.description: Unprocessed rye grains.

ThingDef.label: Tea
ThingDef.description: Fresh tea leaves.

ThingDef.label: Beans
ThingDef.description: Raw beans, edible. They are quite nutritious food.

ThingDef.label: Pineapple
ThingDef.description: Large fruit with a sweet Flavor.

ThingDef.label: Tomato
ThingDef.description: The red vegetable of a herbaceous plant.

ThingDef.label: Cane
ThingDef.description: Unprocessed cane.

ThingDef.label: Bulb onions
ThingDef.description: One of the most important and widespread vegetable crops, known for over 8 thousand years. Bulbs and leaves are used as a seasoning in the canning industry, for salads, vinaigrette, mushrooms, vegetable and meat dishes, as well as a spicy vitamin snack and flavoring additive to soups, sauces, minced meat.

ThingDef.label: Carrot
ThingDef.description: One of the most important and widespread vegetable crops, known for over 8 thousand years. Bulbs and leaves are used as a seasoning in the canning industry, for salads, vinaigrette, mushrooms, vegetable and meat dishes, as well as a spicy vitamin snack and flavoring additive to soups, sauces, minced meat.

ThingDef.label: Cucumber
ThingDef.description: The pimpled fruit of the plant contains a large amount of water.

ThingDef.label: Melon
ThingDef.description: A large sweet fruit containing a large amount of water.

ThingDef.label: Cotton
ThingDef.description: Unprocessed cotton. It is widely used in fabric production.

ThingDef.label: Devilstrand
ThingDef.description: Unprocessed devilstrand. It is widely used in fabric production.

ThingDef.label: Flax
ThingDef.description: Unprocessed flax. It is widely used in fabric production.

ThingDef.label: Coffee
ThingDef.description: Unprocessed coffee beans.

ThingDef.label: Cocoa
ThingDef.description: Unprocessed cocoa beans.

ThingDef.label: Mint
ThingDef.description: All species are highly aromatic, most of them contain a lot of menthol. Can be used in alchemy as a psychic stimulant.

ThingDef.label: Tobacco
ThingDef.description: Raw tobacco leaves.

ThingDef.label: Hemp
ThingDef.description: Raw hemp. It is a raw material for the production of fabrics, as well as a narcotic drug.

ThingDef.label: Poppy
ThingDef.description: Unprocessed poppy flowers. Can be used in alchemy as an amplifier. Care must be taken.

HediffDef.label: high on poppy
HediffDef.description: Hallucinations and pain relief from exposure to unprocessed poppy seeds.

li.label: high on poppy
li.description: I feel like I'm in a light fog. It is so unusual.

NeedDef.label: opium
NeedDef.description: Due to opium addiction, this person is forced to constantly use opiates and their derivatives.

HediffDef.label: opium tolerance
HediffDef.description: A built-up tolerance to opium. The more serious it is, the higher the likelihood of comorbidities and addiction.

HediffDef.label: opium addiction
HediffDef.description: Extremely serious dependence on drugs containing opium or its derivatives.

li.label: poppy withdrawal
li.description: I seem to be floating on an endless ocean of suffering.

ThingDef.label: Aloe
ThingDef.description: Medicinal plant with bactericidal properties. Can be used in alchemy as a poison blocker.

HediffDef.label: aleo vera impact
HediffDef.description: Healing and blood-forming effect of aloe vera extracts.

HediffDef.label: healroot impact
HediffDef.description: The calming and healing effect of the medicinal root.

ThingDef.label: Firewort
ThingDef.description: A plant with sharp leaves and explosive fruits. The fruits of a mature plant easily disintegrate into dust, consisting of sulfur and some organic impurities.

ThingDef.label: Petroleum
ThingDef.description: A plant with an oily body from which some oil can be extracted.

ThingDef.label: Tea fungus
ThingDef.description: A very strange symbiosis of many bacteria and fungi forming a single body structure.

ThingDef.label: Tea fungus wort
ThingDef.description: Preparation for the growth of bacteria and fungi.

ThingDef.label: Pumpkin
ThingDef.description: One of the most important and widespread vegetable crops, known for over 8 thousand years. Bulbs and leaves are used as a seasoning in the canning industry, for salads, vinaigrette, mushrooms, vegetable and meat dishes, as well as a spicy vitamin snack and flavoring additive to soups, sauces, minced meat.

ThingDef.label: Almond
ThingDef.description: A nut that serves as an excellent source of fat and calories.
